channel.title: Tops on Steven Lemonier
channel.description: Recent content in Tops on Steven Lemonier

item.description: Hi! My name is Steven, and I am currently a System Engineer, specialized in Citrix Technologies. I am a CCE-V for now 4 years, and I like to spend a lot of time working on ADC/ADM as well as on automation. I am a co-Leader for the Swiss CUGC for about a year now. I was recently introduced as a Citrix Technology Advocate (CTA)! I have 10 yearsâ€™ experience with Citrix, which sounds not that much in comparison with my fellow specialists, but I always think we can learn from anyone, either he is a newbie in IT or a worldwide class expert.
